WHY CHOOSE US
Our company has provided home insulation, soundproofing, and air sealing services for over a decade. As the first choice for new home builds and renovations, we are dedicated to excellence, efficiency, and quality. 

Our business policy is transparent, and there are no hidden fees. We confidently claim that our business model is far better than the rest.

Quality is our top priority for every project, whether small or large, and we are proud of our reputation and customer satisfaction. Every project is built to the same high standards and consistent quality with our professional crew.

What sets Warm Cozy Cozy apart as your insulation contractor?
As a trusted source for home insulation, Warm Cozy Cozy can inform you about the best materials for each area of your home, saving you money and energy. Insulation is often misused, or steps are overlooked when installing it. In order to provide our customers with the best solutions on the market, we ensure our staff stays current with the latest learning and training provided by industry suppliers and associations.

OUR SERVICES
Attic Insulation
Cellulose insulation is composed from treated wood- or paper-based product. It is mechanically spray blown into open spaces of the house or commercial building to slow down the transmission of heat or cold.

Home Insulation
All year round, insulation maintains a comfortable temperature in our homes, keeping them safe from the cold of winter and the heat of summer. When a house is insulated correctly, it requires very little additional heating and is very energy efficient.

Soundproofing
Just as a building can be insulated for heat, it can also be insulated for sound because it is an excellent way to minimize noise pollution. A complete soundproofing system includes floors, ceilings, and walls for optimal acoustic comfort.

Thermal Home Inspection
Insulation is a thermal transmitter blocker of heat or cold, preventing thermal energy from passing through. That is why we offer thermal imaging home inspections to see precisely where your home is losing heat. No more guessing games; know your home's specific needs.

At Warm Cozy Cozy, we provide insulation removal in certain circumstances. We will provide this service if the following apply:
- When there is a leaky roof, mould will grow.
- Water-damaged insulation will no longer insulate your home.
- Animal infestation leads to unsanitary insulation caused by urine and feces.
- Wires chewed by the animals pose a fire hazard.
- Old insulation no longer insulates your home as it has a lifespan.
- When your old insulation is dirty and causing a bad smell in your home.

Celluloseman Inc. has a unique, state-of-the-art vacuum designed to quickly, effectively, and safely remove all types of attic insulation, as well as high-powered equipment to efficiently replace or add in cellulose or fiberglass insulation.

For more than a decade, Celluloseman Inc. has been a frontrunner in southwestern Ontario’s residential insulation industry. We specialize in insulation extraction and insulation installation, making homes safer, more comfortable, and more affordable to live in. Our highly experienced and licensed technicians will gladly walk you through the process and recommend ways to make your home more energy efficient, as well as address concerns like mold remediation, (vermiculite removal) asbestos abatement, air sealing, draft and soundproofing.

Celluloseman’s expertise and reliability have made us a sought-after insulation contractor in the GTA. We assisted with the insulation removal from hundreds of homes damaged by the catastrophic Sunrise Propane explosion in 2008, and participated in the cleanup effort after a tornado ripped through more than 600 homes in the city of Vaughan in 2011. In 2019, Celluloseman was featured in HGTV's Property Brothers: Forever Home in Season 2. 

All of our technicians are fully licensed and insured, ready to provide quality, dependable service backed by a one-year guarantee. For home insulation in Toronto, Mississauga, Burlington and surrounding areas, Celluloseman can’t be beat.

WHY: Batt insulation does not shift once it has been installed.  While it takes more skill to install then other types of insulation it saves you money up front AND over the long run.  Adding insulation to you attic can be compared to putting on a hat while you are outside on a cold winter day.  Less heat will escape translating to lower heating costs.
